Michigan hit with flooding amid COVID-19 pandemic tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739112 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739112/michigan-hit-with-flooding-amid-covid-19-pandemic/story/ Rising flood waters, already as high as five feet, submerged parts of the central Michigan of Michigan on Wednesday after days of heavy rain led to the failure of two dams and the evacuation of thousands of people. Thu, 21 May 2020 03:50:41 +0800
Cyclone kills 14 in India, Bangladesh leaving trail of destruction tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739111 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739111/cyclone-kills-14-in-india-bangladesh-leaving-trail-of-destruction/story/ A powerful cyclone pounded eastern India and Bangladesh on Wednesday, killing at least 14 people and destroying thousands of homes, officials said, leaving authorities struggling to mount relief efforts amid a surging coronavirus outbreak. Thu, 21 May 2020 02:28:30 +0800

Alamin kung bakit nga ba malaki ang singil ngayong Mayo ng Meralco? tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739104 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739104/alamin-kung-bakit-nga-ba-malaki-ang-singil-ngayong-mayo-ng-meralco/story/ Kasabay ng pag-init ng panahon, ang pag-init din ng ulo ng ilang Meralco customers dahil sa biglaang paglobo ng kanilang electric bills ngayong Mayo. Ano nga ba talaga ang pinagbatayan ng power distributor sa kanilang pagkuwenta sa konsumo ng kuryente kahit walang meter reading? Thu, 21 May 2020 00:06:32 +0800
106,000: WHO reports most new coronavirus cases in a day as total nears 5 million tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739101 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739101/106-000-in-24-hours-who-reports-most-new-coronavirus-cases-in-a-day/story/ There were 106,000 new cases of new coronavirus infection recorded worldwide in the last 24 hours--the most in a single day yet, the World Health Organization said on Wednesday, expressing concern for poor countries even as rich ones emerge from lockdown. Maawaing pulis, binigyan ng $100 ang sinita niyang working-student delivery rider tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739098 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739098/maawaing-pulis-binigyan-ng-100-ang-sinita-niyang-working-student-delivery-rider/story/ Sa sandaling inakala ng isang working-student delivery rider na puro kamalasan ang inabot niya nang araw na mahuli siya ng isang pulis dahil sa maling paraan ng pagpapatakbo ng motorsiklo, nagkamali siya. Dahil sa halip na tiketan siya ng pulis, binigyan siya ng $100. Wed, 20 May 2020 23:42:42 +0800

(NASECORE) has asked the Energy Regulatory Commission (ERC) to look into the convenience fee being charged by the Manila Electric Co.
